content.webTitle: Channel 4 postpones Deal or No Deal for funeral

fields.headline: Channel 4 postpones Deal or No Deal for funeral
fields.bodyText: Channel 4 has replaced today's scheduled edition of quiz show Deal Or No Deal with a repeat. The TV channel pulled the episode after the main contestant suffered a death in the family and had to attend a funeral. Every episode of the hit show, hosted by Noel Edmonds, is recorded in advance. Channel 4 informed viewers of the reason for the repeat with a caption at the end of the programme. "The scheduled programme was replaced by a repeat today because of the personal circumstances of the contestant involved," a Channel 4 spokesman said. "Our thoughts are with her and her family." · To contact the MediaGuardian newsdesk email editor@mediatheguardian.com or phone 020 7239 9857.
